revision.text:
'''Black Cow''' can refer to either:
* A [[Ice cream soda#Root beer float|root beer float]] or [[Ice cream soda|Coke float]] * An alcoholic drink (sometimes referred to as a ''Black Cow #2'') featuring [[Kahl√∫a]], [[Half-and-half#Dairy|half-and-half]], and [[Coca-Cola]] * "Black Cow", a song on Steely Dan's 1977 album [[Aja (album)|''Aja'']] * A chocolate-covered caramel confection, [[Sugar Mama (confectionary)|Sugar Mama]].
==See also== * [[Black Bull (disambiguation)]]
{{Disambiguation}}
